Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-4450 affecting package cloud-hypervisor for versions less than 30.0-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-4450 affecting package cloud-hypervisor for versions less than 30.0-2. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package cloud-hypervisor is earlier than 30.0-2, affected by CVE-2022-4450
